Package spx.utils

Provides utility classes such as the Ticker and Version classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SourceType
    Definitions for the source type values used in the sourceType field of a Heartbeat.
    SystemHealthBit
    Definitions for the health byte bitmask.
    SystemHealthSrc
    Definitions for the source status values (top byte of 16-bit value, the bottom byte is source-specific), used in the sourceStatus field of a Heartbeat.
    Threadable
    The Threadable interface should be implemented by any class whose instances are intended to be executed by a thread and that required shutdown when class is no longer required to run.
    Version
    Version information.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComponentPanel
    ComponentPanel class.
    GradientPanel  
    Image
    The Image class provides utility functions for loading icons and images from the spx.images package.
    IPAddressFormatterFactory
    The IPAddressFormatterFactory can be used as the formatter factory for a JFormattedTextField to restrict valid values to IPv4 addresses.
    NumberField
    The NumberField class is a formatted text field that only allows integer values in the specified range.
    ObjControlPanel
    A panel for setting/getting generic object parameter values from a remote server.
    RegexFormatter
    The RegexFormatter is a regular expression formatter that formats strings based on the specified regex pattern.
    StringUtils
    The StringUtils class contains utility functions that operate on strings.
    SysUtils
    The SysUtils class contains system utilities.
    Ticker
    The Ticker object represents a tick count in milliseconds since an unknown point.
    Visuals
    The Visuals class provides convenience functions for dealing with GraphicsConfiguration, which represent X11 Visuals under Linux.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    StringUtils.Ellipsis
    The Ellipsis enumeration is used to specify where in a string an ellipsis should be used.

Package spx.utils Description

Provides utility classes such as the Ticker and Version classes.
